description.p: ROS-Industrial support for the Adept Viper s650.
This package contains configuration data, 3D models and launch files for Adept Viper s650 manipulators.
Joint limits and max joint velocities are based on the information in the Adept user guides. All URDFs / XACROs are based on the default motion and joint velocity limits, unless noted otherwise.
Before using any of the configuration files and / or meshes included in this package, be sure to check they are correct for the particular robot model and configuration you intend to use them with.
